title: inbuilt video call doesn't work at all in my pixel 2 i have to prefer 3rd party apps like duo, skype
content: Inbuilt video calling doesn't work. I am unable to get a video call from others neither I can place a video call. I do not want to use 3rd party apps like duo, whatsapp etc because iphone users have problems with Google duo and every1 doesn't use whatsapp. please fix this.
